name: Gold Sink
description:
My submission for Mini Jam: 85 with the theme of 'GOLD' with the limitation: 'ONE MINUTE TIMER'.

The player has 60 seconds to delve into a mine and collect as much gold as possible. With multiple different endings the player is encouraged to collect different quantities of gold to find them all.  Good Luck.

Gold Sound Effect: 

https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270303/Wall

Mining Sound Effect:
